citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 12/7/15 at 2:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house. Licensee stated that they were leaving for a prior
scheduled appointment.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
Additional Inspectors
Thornton Karl, Animal Care Inspector

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
*  A facility representative was not available on 12/7/15 at  2:15 PM to do a facility inspection.
*  Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensees house.  Licensee stated that they were leaving for a prior
scheduled appointment.
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
